flawed_nl_solution:
The second movie was 2*0.5=<<2*0.5=1>>1` hour longer than the first movie
So the second movie was 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 hours long
That means the first two movies had a combined time of 3+2=<<3+2=2>>2 hours
So the last movie had a length of 2-1=<<2-1=1>>1 hours
That means the marathon lasted 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 hours
